description:
A giant asteroid is on a collision course for the Earth! The United Nations are helpless, and when Mishima attempts to destroy it with their annihilation missiles, they fail to detonate! Only Kyusaku`s inventions can trigger the duds. It`s time for Nuku Nuku to fulfill her purpose and save the earth!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nuku Nuku lives on - We won`t forget your smile
Nuku Nuku yo Eien ni! Kimi no Egao o Wasurenai!
ヌクヌクよ永遠に! 君の笑顔を忘れない!
